item.title: Sublime Text remember cursors plugin
item.description:
My editor of choice for Python development is Sublime Text. It has been for a very long time (10 years). It's fast, simple and straight to the point, which is why I always resisted the temptation to use more advanced and modern IDEs such as PyCharm or VS code.

There â€¦
